course_description: Drawing on critical Indian dance studies, this course traces the complicated histories of Indian dance, focusing on the intersections of gender, caste, aesthetics, and race. The course reimagines the histories of "classical" Indian dance, both in India and on the transnational stage
sections: Class Nbr: 1922, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: H. Kamath, Status: Open
